reviews.review_msg: Never explain the labs, never answer questions clearly. never respond to emails. always busy, not accessible outside lecture time. do not meet the standards of a professor, he is not as helpful as my classmates. Thank you for doing this to us. Thank you Reza. :) I hope you could make some changes according to our feedbacks, but I know you won't.

his teaching style makes absolutely 0 sense and is completely chaotic and inefficient. if you have a question, you have to attend a lab zoom, no office hours. doesn't reply to emails, explanations for assignments/labs is horrendous and doesn't make any sense, doesn't answer any questions. overall 0/10. drop out asap if you ever get him.
